quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh
quotes.text: Because you are alive, everything is possible.

quotes.author: Dōgen Zenji
quotes.text: If he cannot stop the mind that seeks after fame and profit, he will spend his life without finding peace.

quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh
quotes.text: Letting go gives us freedom, and freedom is the only condition for happiness. If, in our heart, we still cling to anything – anger, anxiety, or possessions – we cannot be free.
